__e: You, as Shirley's friend and a good guy, just saying what's really in your heart.
Jim Clark and his wife Shirley and their kids... people I've known all my life.
I guess it's possible he'd still be alive and rather than memories of just one year, there'd be a lot of years there now.
I don't know, Denny. Maybe Shirley and I aren't right for each other.
Shirley doesn't look old enough to have a 15-year-old daughter.
Guess we do owe you an apology, Shirley. We shouldn't have said those things about you.
